entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as sitting in a pub, looking around and thinking about getting villagers involved in S.P.E.W. She is also mentioned as having been keeping a record of S.P.E.W. members.

entities.name: s.p.e.w.
entities.description: S.P.E.W. is described as an organization that Hermione is trying to get villagers involved in, with the goal of improving house-elves' wages and working conditions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting next to Hermione in the pub, taking a swig of butterbeer under his cloak, and teasing her about S.P.E.W.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's name is mentioned as being on the list of S.P.E.W. members, along with Harry's.

relationships.description: Hermione is a member of S.P.E.W., as evidenced by her keeping a record of members and trying to get villagers involved.
Harry is also a member of S.P.E.W., as his name is on the list of members.
Ron is another member of S.P.E.W., with his name also on the list of members.
Hermione is trying to get villagers involved in S.P.E.W., as she thinks it's time for more direct action.
